levels.description: Drone <@ba.vup>+{attack@cnt}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, releases <@ba.vup>special</> Drones that scatter across the entire battlefield and chase the closest enemy to them; upon reaching their target, inflicts <$ba.fear>Fear</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@fear}</>s, locks the target and attacks it; enemies around the Drones have <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed and take <@ba.vup>{attack@magic_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage every second (does not stack); <@ba.rem>When the Drone's locked-on target is defeated, they will search for a new one; when the skill ends, they return to the Operator</>
